participant_1.background:
I've been in my fair share of fights, but I'm not proud of it.
i like to go out to eat.
I met the love of my life while working at the hospital.
I like cooking homemade meals to balance out my fast food eating habit.
i have 3 brothers.

participant_2.background:
I'm always building models of sports cars, so I guess racing is my favorite sport.
I went to Sicily to visit the real-life locations of The Godfather.
I enjoy playing soccer with my nieces and nephews.
i will graduate from college in two years.
I'm passionate about my career and I want to be the best I can be.

content.text: I'm not a huge fan of sports, but I like to build models of sports cars.
That's cool, I love racing so I guess that's my favorite sport.
Have you ever been to the real-life locations of The Godfather?
No, I haven't been to Sicily yet. It's on my bucket list though.
I went there with my family a few years ago. It was really cool to see where the movie was filmed.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm sure it was really interesting.
It was. I'm glad we went.
I'm sure I'll enjoy it when I go there.
It was nice talking to you.
